full_summary:
# Tender for Replacement of Visual Aids and Other Work at Kuujjuaq Airport
=========================

## Title
EF997-221993-B Replacement of Visual Aids and Other Work at Kuujjuaq Airport

## Solicitation Information
-------------------------------
* *Solicitation reference number:* WS3773704842
* *Amendment number:* 4
* *Publication date:* December 13, 2022
* *Tender closing date:* January 19, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* *Amendment date:* January 16, 2023

## Contract Information
--------------------------

* *Contracting entity:* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* *Contact Information:*
	+ Name: Jessica Cossette Fontaine
	+ Email: [jessica.cossettefontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.cossettefontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* * Procurement Category: CNST
* *Purchase Schedule: Regional Office of Quebec (except NCR)

## Tender Description
---------------------------

By this Request for Proposal (RFP), Public Services and Procurement Canada (TPSGC/PWGSC), on behalf of Transport Canada, invites suppliers to submit proposals for the replacement of visual aids and other work at Kuujjuaq Airport. The scope of work includes the installation of new visual aids and all other required renovations.

Bidders are required to submit their proposals electronically through the link to the RFP: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14886045](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14886045). Proposals must be submitted on or before January 19, 2023, at 14:00 EST.  Any proposals submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

The tender is open to all qualified bidders and is issued in accordance with the [Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement](http://www.aadnc-aandc.gc.ca/eng/1370011568157/1370011571708?searchTerm=Comprehensive%20Land%20Claims%20Agreements) (CLCA), specifically the James Bay and Northern Quebec Agreement (JBNQA), and its [Specific Claims Program](http://www.aadnc-aandc.gc.ca/eng/1370011567543/1370011581047?searchTerm=Specific%20Claims%20
